Package com.telenav.kivakit.filesystem

Class FileCache

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.broadcasters.Multicaster
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.repeaters.BaseRepeater
com.telenav.kivakit.filesystem.FileCache
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Broadcaster, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Listener, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.MessageTransceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Repeater, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Transceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Receiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Transmitter, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Nameable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.NamedObject
public class FileCache extends com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.repeaters.BaseRepeater
A file cache with the given root. Resources can be copied into the cache with add(Resource, WriteMode, ProgressReporter). Files can be retrieved with file(FileName). The cache can be pruned of old files by calling startPruner().

Adding

  • add(Resource, WriteMode)
  • add(Resource, WriteMode, ProgressReporter)
  • addAs(Resource, FileName, WriteMode)
  • addAs(Resource, FileName, WriteMode, ProgressReporter)

Retrieving

  • file(FileName)
  • folder(String)

Pruning

  • maximumAge(Duration)
  • minimumUsableDiskSpace(Percent)
  • startPruner()
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
